doc.title: Letters: Kanojo no tabi no monogatari
doc.plot: An unusual postcard from an old friend. On it is a strange message, "... there is so much for you to see here... if you come I will wait." Before she realizes what she is about to do, Tomo has left for Istanbul. What will happen next? How will she deal with her new surroundings? In her search for answers, our journey together begins...
